category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LOV_legacy_results_control
preference.preference_description: Controls the number of Dynamic LOV values returned by LOV_ask_values_<datatype> ITK APIs. For example: LOV_ask_values_string, LOV_ask_values_int, etc. Valid values: n - where n is greater than 0 - Returns n values. 0 or less than 0 - Returns all the values.
